menu.name: Pepperoni Pizza
menu.description: Daily made pizza dough topped with house marinara, loads of melty mozzarella cheese and garlicky pepperoni. Baked until bubbling and browned.

menu.name: Combination Pizza
menu.description: A house favorite! Daily made pizza dough topped with house marinara, loads of melty mozzarella cheese, Italian sausage, salami, pepperoni, fresh mushrooms, olives and bell peppers. Baked until bubbling and browned.

menu.name: House Pizza
menu.description: Daily made pizza dough topped with house marinara, loads of melty mozzarella cheese, seasoned ground beef, sausage, onions, cilantro and jalapeños. Baked until bubbling and browned.

menu.name: Classic Cheese Pizza
menu.description: Daily made pizza dough topped with house marinara, loads of melty mozzarella cheese and any toppings you'd like!

menu.name: Hawaiian Pizza
menu.description: Daily made pizza dough topped with house marinara, loads of melty mozzarella cheese, ham and sweet pineapple chunks. Baked until bubbling and browned.

menu.name: Chicken Piccata Pizza
menu.description: Daily made pizza dough topped with creamy house white sauce, onions fresh mushrooms, tomatoes, garlic and capers. Baked until bubbling and browned.

menu.name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
menu.description: Daily made pizza dough topped with sweet and smoky BBQ sauce, loads of melty mozzarella cheese, tender grilled chicken and red onions. Baked until bubbling and browned.

menu.name: Via Rome Pizza
menu.description: A house favorite! Daily made pizza dough topped with house marinara, loads of melty mozzarella cheese, pepperoni and Italian sausage. Baked until bubbling and browned.

menu.name: Chicken Pesto Pizza
menu.description: Daily made pizza dough topped with house-made basil pesto, tender grilled chicken, fresh Fresno chilies, mushrooms and bell peppers. Baked until bubbling and browned.

menu.name: White Pizza
menu.description: Daily made pizza dough topped with olive oil, fresh garlic and loads of melty mozzarella cheese. Baked until bubbling and browned.

menu.name: Margherita Pizza
menu.description: Daily made pizza dough topped with fresh tomatoes and basil, olive oil and fresh mozzarella cheese. Baked until bubbling and browned.

menu.name: Vegetarian Pizza
menu.description: Daily made pizza dough topped with house marinara, loads of melty mozzarella cheese, fresh mushrooms, bell peppers, tomatoes, garlic, onions and olives. Baked until bubbling and browned.

menu.name: Meat Lovers Pizza
menu.description: Daily made pizza dough topped with house marinara, loads of melty mozzarella cheese, seasoned ground beef, sausage, salami and ham. Baked until bubbling and browned.

menu.name: Supreme Pizza
menu.description: A house favorite! Daily made pizza dough topped with house marinara, loads of melty mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, ham, bell pepper, onions and jalapeños. Baked until bubbling and browned.

menu.name: Calzone
menu.description: Our fresh pizza dough filled with creamy ricotta cheese and up to 3 toppings of your choice. Baked to order until golden brown.

menu.name: House Salad
menu.description: Crisp lettuce topped with ripe tomatoes, fresh bell peppers and red onions.

menu.name: Caesar Salad
menu.description: Crisp romaine hearts, toasted croutons and shaved Parmesan cheese.

menu.name: Greek Salad
menu.description: Crisp romaine hearts topped with ripe tomatoes, red onions, bell peppers, briny Kalamata olives and tangy feta cheese.
